mapper.sql: INJECTION_LABEL_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_CODE, INJECTION_LABEL_NAME, INJECTION_LABEL_DESC, LABEL_TYPE, LABEL_VALUE_TYPE, LABEL_DATA_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, RIGHT_OPERAND, CONDITION_TYPE, OPERATOR, SCOPE, TAG_ROW_ID, IS_SHARED, CATALOG_ID, CLASS_NAME, LAB_RELEVANT_FLAG, LAB_MISS_RATE, LAB_OBJECT_CODE, LAB_OBJECT, LAB_LEVEL1, LAB_LEVEL1_NAME, LAB_LEVEL2, LAB_LEVEL2_NAME, LAB_LEVEL3, LAB_LEVEL3_NAME, LAB_LEVEL4, LAB_LEVEL4_NAME, LAB_LEVEL5, LAB_LEVEL5_NAME, LAB_LEVEL6, LAB_LEVEL6_NAME, LAB_UPDATE_FEQ, LAB_BUSI_DESC, LAB_TECH_DESC, LAB_STATE, LAB_MANAGE_TYPE, LAB_TAG_CODE, SYSTEM_INFO_ID, ORIGINAL_LAB_LEVEL1_NAME, ORIGINAL_LAB_LEVEL2_NAME, ORIGINAL_LAB_LEVEL3_NAME, ORIGINAL_LAB_LEVEL1_CODE, ORIGINAL_LAB_LEVEL2_CODE, ORIGINAL_LAB_LEVEL3_CODE
mapper.insert: insert into injection_label (INJECTION_LABEL_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_CODE, INJECTION_LABEL_NAME, INJECTION_LABEL_DESC, LABEL_TYPE, LABEL_VALUE_TYPE, LABEL_DATA_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, RIGHT_OPERAND, CONDITION_TYPE, OPERATOR, SCOPE, TAG_ROW_ID, IS_SHARED, CATALOG_ID, CLASS_NAME, LAB_RELEVANT_FLAG, LAB_MISS_RATE, LAB_OBJECT_CODE, LAB_OBJECT, LAB_LEVEL1, LAB_LEVEL1_NAME, LAB_LEVEL2, LAB_LEVEL2_NAME, LAB_LEVEL3, LAB_LEVEL3_NAME, LAB_LEVEL4, LAB_LEVEL4_NAME, LAB_LEVEL5, LAB_LEVEL5_NAME, LAB_LEVEL6, LAB_LEVEL6_NAME, LAB_UPDATE_FEQ, LAB_BUSI_DESC, LAB_TECH_DESC, LAB_STATE, LAB_MANAGE_TYPE, LAB_TAG_CODE,SYSTEM_INFO_ID, LAB_EXAMPLE, LAB_EFFECTIVE_DATE, LAB_EXPIRATION_DATE, DAMANDER, DAMAND_DEPARTMENT, DAMAND_DESCRIPTION) values (#{injectionLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{injectionLabelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{injectionLabelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{injectionLabelDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labelValueType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labelDataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rightOperand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{conditionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scope,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tagRowId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isShared,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{catalogId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labRelevantFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labMissRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labObjectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labLevel1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labLevel1Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labLevel2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labLevel2Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labLevel3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labLevel3Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labLevel4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labLevel4Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labLevel5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labLevel5Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labLevel6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labLevel6Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labTagCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{systemInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{labExample,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labEffectiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{labExpirationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{damander,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{damandDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{damandDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update injection_label set ORIGINAL_LAB_LEVEL1_NAME = #{originalLabLevel1Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGINAL_LAB_LEVEL2_NAME = #{originalLabLevel2Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGINAL_LAB_LEVEL3_NAME = #{originalLabLevel3Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGINAL_LAB_LEVEL1_CODE = #{originalLabLevel1Code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGINAL_LAB_LEVEL2_CODE = #{originalLabLevel2Code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGINAL_LAB_LEVEL3_CODE = #{originalLabLevel3Code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where INJECTION_LABEL_CODE = #{injectionLabelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select INJECTION_LABEL_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_CODE, INJECTION_LABEL_NAME, INJECTION_LABEL_DESC, LABEL_TYPE, LABEL_VALUE_TYPE, LABEL_DATA_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, RIGHT_OPERAND, CONDITION_TYPE, OPERATOR, SCOPE, TAG_ROW_ID, IS_SHARED, CATALOG_ID, CLASS_NAME, LAB_RELEVANT_FLAG, LAB_MISS_RATE, LAB_OBJECT_CODE, LAB_OBJECT, LAB_LEVEL1, LAB_LEVEL1_NAME, LAB_LEVEL2, LAB_LEVEL2_NAME, LAB_LEVEL3, LAB_LEVEL3_NAME, LAB_LEVEL4, LAB_LEVEL4_NAME, LAB_LEVEL5, LAB_LEVEL5_NAME, LAB_LEVEL6, LAB_LEVEL6_NAME, LAB_UPDATE_FEQ, LAB_BUSI_DESC, LAB_TECH_DESC, LAB_STATE, LAB_MANAGE_TYPE, LAB_TAG_CODE, SYSTEM_INFO_ID from injection_label where INJECTION_LABEL_ID = #{injectionLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select INJECTION_LABEL_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_CODE, INJECTION_LABEL_NAME, INJECTION_LABEL_DESC, LABEL_TYPE, LABEL_VALUE_TYPE, LABEL_DATA_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, RIGHT_OPERAND, CONDITION_TYPE, OPERATOR, SCOPE, TAG_ROW_ID, IS_SHARED, CATALOG_ID, CLASS_NAME, LAB_RELEVANT_FLAG, LAB_MISS_RATE, LAB_OBJECT_CODE, LAB_OBJECT, LAB_LEVEL1, LAB_LEVEL1_NAME, LAB_LEVEL2, LAB_LEVEL2_NAME, LAB_LEVEL3, LAB_LEVEL3_NAME, LAB_LEVEL4, LAB_LEVEL4_NAME, LAB_LEVEL5, LAB_LEVEL5_NAME, LAB_LEVEL6, LAB_LEVEL6_NAME, LAB_UPDATE_FEQ, LAB_BUSI_DESC, LAB_TECH_DESC, LAB_STATE, LAB_MANAGE_TYPE, LAB_TAG_CODE, SYSTEM_INFO_ID from injection_label
mapper.insert:
insert into injection_label (INJECTION_LABEL_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_CODE, INJECTION_LABEL_NAME, INJECTION_LABEL_DESC, LABEL_TYPE, LABEL_VALUE_TYPE, LABEL_DATA_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, RIGHT_OPERAND, CONDITION_TYPE,OPERATOR,SCOPE,TAG_ROW_ID, IS_SHARED,CATALOG_ID, CLASS_NAME,SYSTEM_INFO_ID) values
(#{injectionLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{injectionLabelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{injectionLabelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{injectionLabelDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labelValueType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labelDataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rightOperand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{conditionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{scope,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tagRowId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isShared,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{catalogId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{systemInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select:
select INJECTION_LABEL_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_CODE, INJECTION_LABEL_NAME, INJECTION_LABEL_DESC, LABEL_TYPE, LABEL_VALUE_TYPE, LABEL_DATA_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, RIGHT_OPERAND, CONDITION_TYPE, OPERATOR,SCOPE,TAG_ROW_ID,IS_SHARED,CATALOG_ID, CLASS_NAME from injection_label where 1=1
and INJECTION_LABEL_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{labelName}),'%')

select INJECTION_LABEL_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_CODE, INJECTION_LABEL_NAME, INJECTION_LABEL_DESC, LABEL_TYPE, LABEL_VALUE_TYPE, LABEL_DATA_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, RIGHT_OPERAND, CONDITION_TYPE, OPERATOR, SCOPE, TAG_ROW_ID, IS_SHARED, CATALOG_ID, CLASS_NAME, LAB_RELEVANT_FLAG, LAB_MISS_RATE, LAB_OBJECT_CODE, LAB_OBJECT, LAB_LEVEL1, LAB_LEVEL1_NAME, LAB_LEVEL2, LAB_LEVEL2_NAME, LAB_LEVEL3, LAB_LEVEL3_NAME, LAB_LEVEL4, LAB_LEVEL4_NAME, LAB_LEVEL5, LAB_LEVEL5_NAME, LAB_LEVEL6, LAB_LEVEL6_NAME, LAB_UPDATE_FEQ, LAB_BUSI_DESC, LAB_TECH_DESC, LAB_STATE, LAB_MANAGE_TYPE, LAB_TAG_CODE,SYSTEM_INFO_ID from injection_label where INJECTION_LABEL_CODE = #{labelCode}

select INJECTION_LABEL_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_CODE, INJECTION_LABEL_NAME, INJECTION_LABEL_DESC, LABEL_TYPE, LABEL_VALUE_TYPE, LABEL_DATA_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, RIGHT_OPERAND, CONDITION_TYPE, OPERATOR,SCOPE,TAG_ROW_ID,IS_SHARED, CATALOG_ID,CLASS_NAME from injection_label where TAG_ROW_ID = #{tagRowId}

select INJECTION_LABEL_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_CODE, INJECTION_LABEL_NAME, INJECTION_LABEL_DESC, LABEL_TYPE, LABEL_VALUE_TYPE, LABEL_DATA_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, RIGHT_OPERAND, CONDITION_TYPE, OPERATOR,SCOPE,TAG_ROW_ID,IS_SHARED,CATALOG_ID, CLASS_NAME from injection_label
INJECTION_LABEL_ID not in
#{item}
and INJECTION_LABEL_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{labelName}),'%')

select INJECTION_LABEL_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_CODE, INJECTION_LABEL_NAME, INJECTION_LABEL_DESC, LABEL_TYPE, LABEL_VALUE_TYPE, LABEL_DATA_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, RIGHT_OPERAND, CONDITION_TYPE, OPERATOR,SCOPE,TAG_ROW_ID,IS_SHARED,CATALOG_ID, CLASS_NAME from injection_label where CATALOG_ID = #{catalogId}

select label.INJECTION_LABEL_ID, label.INJECTION_LABEL_CODE, label.INJECTION_LABEL_NAME, label.INJECTION_LABEL_DESC, label.LABEL_TYPE, label.LABEL_VALUE_TYPE, label.LABEL_DATA_TYPE, label.STATUS_CD, label.CREATE_STAFF, label.UPDATE_STAFF, label.CREATE_DATE, label.STATUS_DATE, label.UPDATE_DATE, label.REMARK, label.RIGHT_OPERAND, label.CONDITION_TYPE, label.OPERATOR,label.SCOPE,label.TAG_ROW_ID,label.IS_SHARED, label.CATALOG_ID,label.CLASS_NAME from injection_label label left join injection_label_grp_mbr mbr on label.INJECTION_LABEL_ID = mbr.INJECTION_LABEL_ID left join injection_label_grp grp on grp.GRP_ID = mbr.GRP_ID where grp.GRP_ID = #{grpId}

select INJECTION_LABEL_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_CODE, INJECTION_LABEL_NAME, INJECTION_LABEL_DESC, LABEL_TYPE, LABEL_VALUE_TYPE, LABEL_DATA_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, RIGHT_OPERAND, CONDITION_TYPE, OPERATOR,SCOPE,TAG_ROW_ID,IS_SHARED,CATALOG_ID, CLASS_NAME from injection_label where CONDITION_TYPE = 2

select i.INJECTION_LABEL_CODE as labelCode, i.LABEL_TYPE as labelType, i.INJECTION_LABEL_NAME as labelName,dcl.MESSAGE_TYPE as typeCode,m.MESSAGE_NAME as typeName from injection_label i left join display_column_label dcl on i.INJECTION_LABEL_ID = dcl.INJECTION_LABEL_ID left join message m on dcl.MESSAGE_TYPE = m.MESSAGE_ID where dcl.DISPLAY_ID = #{grpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select i.LABEL_TYPE from injection_label i left join tar_grp_condition con on con.LEFT_PARAM = i.INJECTION_LABEL_ID left join tar_grp grp on grp.TAR_GRP_ID = con.TAR_GRP_ID left join mkt_strategy_conf_rule rule on rule.TAR_GRP_ID = grp.TAR_GRP_ID where rule.MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_RULE_ID = #{ruleId}
